Text:
Thanks for sharing this! Game works fine so far, with the Ultra High graphics preset I get 28/25 fps in the benchmark, on a mid 2011 iMac 21" with the ATI 6770 built in.

Had to jump through a few loops however to make it work. First off, The Unarchiver would report a corrupted archive, which is wrong because 7z extracted everything just fine. Secondly, the game wouldn't start, the executeable flag was missing, I had to do 

chmod a+x ./F1 2012.app/Contents/MacOS/F1 2012

to get it to work. After that, just click play as the instructions say.
how to extract this files to one????

DAT LEECHERS!!!

Keep da seeds comin'
can some one  seed i'm stuck at 40% for 24 hour
If you are on a Mac, BetterZip will allow you to unzip this file correctly also. All i did was unzip with betterzip then play, works great.
I download this 2 times all ready and still have issue if checksum is failed. How to unpack this to f12012.app ?? Any ideas ?? I`m use "The Unarchiver" to extract this to one file.
Problem with "The Unarchiver" has been reported before: http://code.google.com/p/theunarchiver/issues/detail?id=594
@anthony0224 I used BetterZip but it only creates one zip file of the 42 .rar files...how do I play?
god damn people need to seed

Ok so because this is a split archive, simply open mo-f12012.r00.  This is the first file in the download.  However, if you use the Unarchiver, it will tell you there are a couple of files that are corrupt and I don't know how to get around this problem.  @mojo-666 suggested using 7-zip will extract the .rar files without any problems, however, 7-zip is a windows application, so I don't know how to get past this problem.
@lostinostin: the first main rar file isn't mo-f12012.r00, it is mo-f12012.rar. Also I didn't write anything about 7-zip, I wrote 7z, which is a native OS X command line app.
fist get the unrarx free  after install unrarx grab all the file and drop to the box of unrarx and waite until he finish and boom u have the f1 and then drop the f1 to the application thanks
great work thenoobish  like always thanks
i forget is work in my macbook pro 2011

@mojo-666

Could you be more specific on how to use the
chmod a+x ./F1 2012.app/Contents/MacOS/F1 2012?

I guess I should use Terminal but a just copy/paste doesn't do the trick :(

crap I missed the first slash..

chmod a+x /Applications/F1\ 2012.app/Contents/MacOS/F1\ 2012

No problem with unpacking using Stuffit. Thank you thenoobish, for the upload. 

I bought this game for PC cause I thought it was not available for Mac. Now I don't have to reboot my Mac as PC just to play :)
